body:
From a fresh `develop` checkout : 

```
$ pwd
/home/mculpo/tmp/spack/lzo-2.09

$ ls 
aclocal.m4  AUTHORS   B     ChangeLog       config.hin  configure.ac  doc       include  lzotest      Makefile.in  NEWS    src    THANKS
asm         autoconf  BUGS  CMakeLists.txt  configure   COPYING       examples  INSTALL  Makefile.am  minilzo      README  tests  util

$ spack find lzo
==> 1 installed packages.
-- linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64 / gcc@4.8 ------------------------------
lzo@2.09

$ ls -larth /home/mculpo/github/spack-llnl/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.8/lzo-2.09-mcirxjajt6gempfzlr3qq2prgdm2vceg
total 24K
drwxrwxr-x 7 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 11:13 ..
drwxrwxr-x 3 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 11:25 share
drwxrwxr-x 3 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 11:25 include
drwxrwxr-x 6 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 11:25 .
drwxrwxr-x 3 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 11:25 .spack
drwxrwxr-x 2 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 12:47 lib

$ spack setup lzo@2.09
==> Installing lzo
==> No need to fetch for DIY.
==> Sources for DIY stages are not cached
==> Using source directory: /home/mculpo/tmp/spack/lzo-2.09
==> No patches needed for lzo
==> Building lzo
==> Successfully installed lzo
  Fetch: 0.00s.  Build: 7.18s.  Total: 7.18s.
[+] /home/mculpo/github/spack-llnl/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.8/lzo-2.09-mcirxjajt6gempfzlr3qq2prgdm2vceg

$ ls -larth /home/mculpo/github/spack-llnl/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.8/lzo-2.09-mcirxjajt6gempfzlr3qq2prgdm2vceg
total 24K
drwxrwxr-x 7 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 11:13 ..
drwxrwxr-x 3 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 11:25 share
drwxrwxr-x 3 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 11:25 include
drwxrwxr-x 6 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 11:25 .
drwxrwxr-x 3 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 11:25 .spack
drwxrwxr-x 2 mculpo mculpo 4,0K lug 13 12:55 lib

```
title: `spack setup` : may overwrite already installed software
